lead_paragraph: Republican national security leaders and experts have assailed GOP presidential candidate Donald Trump as unfit to be commander in chief, calling him dishonest and describing his positions on key issues as dangerous and uninformed.

headline.main: Conservative National Security Leaders Unite to Oppose Trump
headline.print_headline: Conservative National Security Leaders Unite to Oppose Trump

snippet: Republican national security leaders and experts have assailed GOP presidential candidate Donald Trump as unfit to be commander in chief, calling him dishonest and describing his positions on key issues as dangerous and uninformed.
